attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A free chip and Pin registration for all responsible dog owners to raise the standard of Pet/animal ownership to ensure a level of responsibility is set and maintained in a community .Offering free mobile Vet clinics, near the locals Town hall which inserts the tracking device and registers all details on the Govt administration allianced site, whatever body that may be.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
